title: African Burial Ground National Monument: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     March 28, 2016  African Burial Ground NM Commemorates 25th Anniversary With Film Debut, Panel Discussion  On Thursday, March 31, join African Burial Ground National Monument, the United Nations Remember Slavery Programme, and EVT Educational Productions, Inc. for a 25th anniversary commemoration of the rediscovery of New York City’s African Burial Ground.   February 01, 2016  Celebrate African-American History Month at African Burial Ground National Monument  Celebrate African-American History Month by visiting African Burial Ground National Monument! Five special events are planned for the month of February.   December 07, 2015  Kwanzaa 2015  Celebrate Kwanzaa at African Burial Ground National Memorial on Saturday, December 26, 2015.               This photo shows our memorial from above shortly after it opened in 2007
